Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Forever
programme.desc: A woman's (Claudette Colbert) husband (Orson Welles), listed dead in World War I, goes to work for her second husband (George Brent) during World War II.

programme.title: Since You Went Away
programme.desc: When her husband leaves to fight in World War II, housewife Anne Hilton (Claudette Colbert) must struggle on alone to raise their two daughters, Jane (Jennifer Jones) and Bridget (Shirley Temple). With a tight budget, Anne is forced to take in two lodgers, elderly ex-soldier Col. William G. Smollett (Monty Woolley) and handsome Lt. Tony Willet (Joseph Cotten). However, loyal maid Fidelia (Hattie McDaniel) stays on unpaid and the makeshift household pulls together through home front hardships.

programme.title: Meet John Doe
programme.desc: A reporter writes a fictitious column about a man named John Doe, who claims to despair at America's neglect of the little people and plans to kill himself. To maintain the ruse, the newspaper hires a ballplayer-turned-hobo to pose as John Doe.

programme.title: Riding the California Trail
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Gilbert Roland) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) rescue a senorita.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid in Old New Mexico
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid (Duncan Renaldo) and Pancho (Martin Garralaga) free a girl (Gwen Kenyon) accused of murder, then find the killer.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick, an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible; his simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: Deputy Marshal

programme.title: Bandit Queen
programme.desc: A young woman (Barbara Britton) becomes a masked avenger after gold-grabbers kill her Spanish parents in old California.

programme.title: Outlaw Women
programme.desc: A gambling queen (Marie Windsor) and her henchwomen run things until a U.S. marshal (Richard Rober) comes to town.

programme.title: Fury at Gunsight Pass
programme.desc: One bank robber (David Brian) double-crosses another (Neville Brand), giving the undertaker and others a chance at the loot.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: The honorable Calem Ware (Randolph Scott), marshal of the Wild West boomtown of Medicine Bend, attempts to defuse the simmering tensions in his rapidly growing and increasingly violent town, as a greedy businessman (Warner Anderson) hires a sinister black-gloved gunman (Michael Pate) to take care of his problems with the marshal for good. Meanwhile, a traveling song-and-dance troupe arrives in town, bearing Ware's lost love, Tally (Angela Lansbury), who holds the secret to his violent past.

programme.title: Come to the Stable
programme.desc: In this heartwarming 1949 film, Sister Margaret (Loretta Young) and Sister Scholastica (Celeste Holm) arrive unannounced and determined to build a children's hospital in the small New England town of Bethlehem. They seek to fulfill a promise they made to God when he saved a similar infirmary in war-torn Normandy. To build it, the sisters recruit various townspeople, negotiate with a bookie (Thomas Gomez) for the land and contend with a songwriter (Hugh Marlowe) who's set against the project.

programme.title: Room for One More
programme.desc: Poppy (Cary Grant) and Anna Rose (Betsy Drake) have a soft spot for young people in need. Despite having three children of their own, they can't help but take action when they meet a pair of troubled young orphans. Young Jane (Iris Mann) is horribly depressed, while Jimmy (Clifford Tatum Jr.) is physically disabled and has a long history as a troublemaker. As they welcome the pair into their home, the Roses use love and understanding to help the orphans get to the bottom of their problems.

programme.title: Young at Heart
programme.desc: Gregory Tuttle (Robert Keith), a widowed musician, is the father of three extraordinarily gifted daughters, Laurie (Doris Day), Fran (Dorothy Malone) and Amy (Elisabeth Fraser), all of whom are facing different romantic troubles. The arrival of two handsome musicians, Alex Burke (Gig Young) and Barney Sloan (Frank Sinatra), who have been invited by Gregory to board at the house while working on a new musical, further complicates the daughters' love lives.

programme.title: Robin Hood of Monterey
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid and Pancho set out to prove the innocence of a young rancher charged with murdering his father.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Thieves purloin the manuscript of a biography of a man who recently died.

programme.title: Two Guys From Texas
programme.desc: Song-and-dance men Steve Carroll (Dennis Morgan) and Danny Foster (Jack Carson) walk to a Texas dude ranch after their car runs out of gas. The team's friend, singer Maggie Reed (Penny Edwards), gets the boys a job. With their auto stolen, the two settle into ranch life. While Danny consults with Dr. Straeger (Fred Clark) to conquer his fear of animals, Steve courts ranch owner Joan Winston (Dorothy Malone). When their stolen car is used in a robbery, the duo must then find the real culprits.

programme.title: Fitzwilly
programme.desc: In this clever 1960s comedy, tireless and loyal butler Fitzwilly (Dick Van Dyke) hides from his eccentric spinster boss, Victoria Woodhouse (Edith Evans), the fact that she has been bankrupt since her father died. Through wily schemes with his fellow servants, he creates one racket, swindle or con after another to maintain the household and fund his employer's frivolous philanthropy. When new secretary Juliet (Barbara Feldon) is hired on, Fitzwilly's life gets even more complicated.

programme.desc: Tough trapper Flint Mitchell (Clark Gable) is a tenacious survivor in the unforgiving wilderness of the West. Determined to stay on the good side of the local Blackfoot tribe, Flint is intent on marrying Kamiah (Maria Elena Marques), the beautiful daughter of Ironshirt (Ricardo Montalban) -- especially since this union would allow him to freely pursue his trade in the region. Struggling to win the approval of the protective Ironshirt, Flint finds himself truly falling for Kamiah.

programme.title: The Trouble With Angels
programme.desc: Mary (Hayley Mills) and her friend, Rachel (June Harding), are new students at St. Francis Academy, a boarding school run by the iron fist of Mother Superior (Rosalind Russell). The immature teens grow bored and begin playing pranks on both the unsuspecting nuns and their unpleasant classmates, becoming a constant thorn in Mother Superior's side. However, as the years pass, Mary and Rachel slowly mature and begin to see the nuns in a different light.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes is visited by a woman who is concerned about her husband's habit of smoking opium to heighten his writing ability.

programme.title: The Trouble With Angels
programme.desc: Mary (Hayley Mills) and her friend, Rachel (June Harding), are new students at St. Francis Academy, a boarding school run by the iron fist of Mother Superior (Rosalind Russell). The immature teens grow bored and begin playing pranks on both the unsuspecting nuns and their unpleasant classmates, becoming a constant thorn in Mother Superior's side. However, as the years pass, Mary and Rachel slowly mature and begin to see the nuns in a different light.

programme.desc: Chandler and Monica reconcile and hastily decide to get married; Ross and Rachel get drunk and roam the casino; Phoebe deals with a lurker on the slot machines.

programme.desc: Claire wants to give Haley and Alex a great experience on Take your Daughter to Work Day but employees make things difficult; Jay has to help out at Joe's preschool when Gloria has jury duty; Mitch and Cam cannot agree on who to invite to a party.

programme.desc: Luke is arrested for driving without a license; Alex is caught sneaking out of a liquor store; Cam thinks Gloria should re-create and sell her family's hot sauce; Haley and Dylan have an awkward encounter with Beth and Andy.

programme.desc: S2025 Professional snowboarder Danny Kass, winner of two Olympic silver medals and even more Winter X Games bling, teams up with Australian colleague Luke "the Dingo" Trembath for a rollicking sports travel series. If there's fresh powder and a steep incline, chances are these two fun-loving guys and their entourage are speeding there in their customized RV, eagerly awaiting the chance to display their talents. While the emphasis is on snowboarding, the energetic hosts also dabble in any other extreme sport that may come their way, as well as the usual off-hour, juvenile high jinks.

programme.title: Camp Woodward
programme.desc: S2025 For most children, summer camp is a time of singing songs by the fire, creating gimp bracelets in arts and crafts, and munching on s'mores. For a special breed of camper, however, it's the season for practicing a 180 G-Turn or mastering a 50/50 grind. "Camp Woodward" follows young daredevils-in-training into the Pennsylvania Dutch countryside, where action-sports counselors and visiting guest professionals help turn these skateboarding and BMX students into the Tony Hawks and Ryan Nyquists of tomorrow.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A gambler uses a mentally disabled man as a pawn when Matt exposes him as a cheat.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt tries to prove a boastful bully is guilty of cold-blooded murder when he provokes gunfights with men who have no chance against him.

programme.title: Bandolero!
programme.desc: There is little hope for bandit Dee Bishop (Dean Martin) and his gang as they wait to be hanged. But at the last second, the hangman -- Dee's brother, Mace (James Stewart), in disguise -- helps them escape. After kidnapping a rancher's wife (Raquel Welch) and with the vengeful sheriff (George Kennedy) in pursuit, they retreat to an abandoned town. Tired of their desperado life, the brothers consider going straight. But when a gang of bandoleros attacks, their chances at starting over seem dim.

programme.title: Gunsmoke

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne captures a killer and tames terror merchants.

programme.desc: A British admiral (Edward Mulhare) takes Boone, Ben Franklin, a French agent and a widow (Anna Lee) captive in Virginia.

programme.desc: An idealistic schoolteacher (George Gobel) incites Boonesborough's wrath by giving gunpowder to the Shawnees.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. programme.title: Catch 21

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash -- up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show -- with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot -- as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

Each team's goal is to guess the results of audience survey questions. A player from each team initially faces off, answering the question to earn the chance to either pass or play. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Flip Side
programme.desc: The hilarious survey game show explores answers to questions from differing perspectives; host Jaleel White.

programme.title: The Perfect Line
programme.desc: Deborah Norville hosts a fun, new game in which contestants must arrange events, items or people in the correct order to create "The Perfect Line" and a chance to win more than $15,000.

programme.title: People Puzzler
programme.desc: Leah Remini hosts the show, which features three contestants who put their pop culture knowledge to the test to complete crosswords from the pop culture magazine. During a player's turn, one word out of 10 is chosen from the board. The contestant is then shown the first unrevealed letter in the word, and a clue is given, with correct answers scoring points based on the word. The player who wins the most points after three rounds moves forward to the fast puzzle bonus round, where they get the opportunity to win a cash prize.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Gene Rayburn hosts this comedy-game show hybrid in which contestants try to match answers given by celebrities to humorous, and often risque, fill-in-the-blank questions. The contestant with the most points at the end of the game advances to play the bonus round, in which the contestant has a chance to win thousands of dollars, with the actual amount dependent on the rules in place at the time of the episode.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Two teams of three compete to complete a chain of words after the first and last words in the chain are revealed. The team that completes the most chains wins and advances to a bonus round to determine the amount of money won. Dylan Lane hosts.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Two teams of three compete to complete a chain of words after the first and last words in the chain are revealed. The team that completes the most chains wins and advances to a bonus round to determine the amount of money won. Dylan Lane hosts.

programme.title: Catch 21
programme.desc: Players must combine their trivia talent with card-counting skills to win at "Catch 21." Alfonso Ribiero hosts.

programme.title: Catch 21
programme.desc: Players must combine their trivia talent with card-counting skills to win at "Catch 21." Alfonso Ribiero hosts.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash -- up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show -- with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot -- as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: Master Minds
programme.desc: Three challengers take on some of the great minds in trivia in a showdown of smarts and strategy; the last contestant standing will face off against the highest scoring Master Mind in a head-to-head battle.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Flip Side
programme.desc: The hilarious survey game show explores answers to questions from differing perspectives; host Jaleel White.

programme.title: The Perfect Line
programme.desc: Deborah Norville hosts a fun, new game in which contestants must arrange events, items or people in the correct order to create "The Perfect Line" and a chance to win more than $15,000.

programme.title: Beat the Bridge
programme.desc: An interactive bridge dares players to cross by stepping on the right answers to challenging trivia questions; each step forward puts money in the team's bank, with bonus money for each successful crossing.

programme.title: Beat the Bridge
programme.desc: An interactive bridge dares players to cross by stepping on the right answers to challenging trivia questions; each step forward puts money in the team's bank, with bonus money for each successful crossing.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Brooke Burns hosts this trivia battle based on a popular U.K. series. In the game, a team of three contestants takes part in a fast-paced quiz in an attempt to earn as much money as possible by answering a series of questions in 60 seconds. Any money earned goes into a team bank that can be won by any team members remaining at the end of the show. Competing against the team is a quiz genius known as the Beast. His role is to catch contestants by answering more questions than they, so they cannot bank money. In the final round, the contestants who have survived the initial chase battle the Beast for the entire amount that has been banked. But beating the Beast won't be easy. The trivia veteran has degrees from Oxford, Exeter and Glamorgan universities.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Press Your Luck
programme.desc: Three contestants compete against one another in a game of wits and strategy, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board. The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

The trivia veteran has degrees from Oxford, Exeter and Glamorgan universities.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Press Your Luck
programme.desc: Three contestants compete against one another in a game of wits and strategy, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board. The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. Each team's goal is to guess the results of audience survey questions. A player from each team initially faces off, answering the question to earn the chance to either pass or play. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune

programme.title: Flip Side
programme.desc: The hilarious survey game show explores answers to questions from differing perspectives; host Jaleel White.

programme.title: The Perfect Line
programme.desc: Deborah Norville hosts a fun, new game in which contestants must arrange events, items or people in the correct order to create "The Perfect Line" and a chance to win more than $15,000.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show -- with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot -- as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run) and hosted until his death in 2020.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Gene Rayburn hosts this comedy-game show hybrid in which contestants try to match answers given by celebrities to humorous, and often risque, fill-in-the-blank questions. The contestant with the most points at the end of the game advances to play the bonus round, in which the contestant has a chance to win thousands of dollars, with the actual amount dependent on the rules in place at the time of the episode.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash -- up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.desc: Jonathan embarks on a mission to find out what Cypriots consider beautiful. He explores ancient caves in the Troodos mountain ranges, wreck dives, akes flight on a microlight and tries the local moonshine - Zivania.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Exploring the most remote Bahamian Islands and learn the history of these shallow seas.

programme.title: Top Travel
programme.desc: Tapestry and weaving lessons; ancient castles.

programme.title: 5 Star Getaways
programme.desc: This series is a sun-filled invitation to travel and visit magnificent all-inclusive 5 star resorts throughout the world, their magnificent surroundings and the exciting excursions one can do at each destination.

programme.title: Tasting America
programme.desc: TV personality Kacey Taormina ("Real Estate Wars") is in Laguna Beach, Calif., to sample the food.

programme.title: Wardens
programme.desc: Protecting Montana Waters from Aquatic Invasive Species is a top priority for Montana FWP.

programme.title: Dream Cruises
programme.desc: From the province of Assam in northeastern India, cruise down the Brahmaputra River onboard the Mahabaahu, we'll set off this Indian Dream Cruise through a country steeped in legend and mystery.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E15 Suspicion Lucas and Mark find Winslow Quince stranded in the desert with a broken wagon wheel. They stop to help, and when they get to North Fork with Quince, many note his gold coin purchases and lavish gifts. Lucas is suspicious, and townsfolk want answers.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E10 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 1 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that endangers the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E11 Bat Masterson & the Dodge City Dead Line: Part 2 Legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson looks back on his time as sheriff of Dodge City when he and Wyatt Earp worked together to bring law and order to the notorious frontier town. As they struggle to pacify the rowdy cowhands passing through town, the two men draw their own proverbial line in the sand. South of the railroad track that splits the town, they let the cowboys run wild. But on the north side, they outlaw all guns in an effort to create a zone of civility. When a troublemaker crosses this dead line with his gun, it sets off a chain reaction of violence that ends the life of the town's beloved entertainer, the celebrated singer Dora Hand. After tracking down her killer, Masterson shoots him in the arm as he tries to escape. When the judge learns there are no witnesses, however, he sets the killer free due to lack of evidence, leaving Masterson with a moral dilemma. Does he seek revenge or await the slow

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: When a card shark receives a letter from a distant and troubled son, he travels to rescue the boy and his mother. During a train ride, the gambler meets a friendly, prideful young card player and shares his wisdom.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. He quickly realizes that there's more to this competition than handling a colt, and presentation has a lot to do with his score. Cody finds the perfect herd to start a special cattle sale and shares his idea for the business with Bubba, but he is hesitant. Once Booger is back, the cowboys meet to discuss the future of their business, but they don't all see eye-to-eye. Cody and Bubba want to be supportive of Booger but are frustrated that his dedication to the Road to the Horse competition has taken priority over their business. The lack of direction causes tension between the cowboys. Feeling divided, they all start to question the future of their business.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E4 Buckskin for the Win! The cowboys are unable to decide on exactly how they want to move their business forward. In the meantime, they continue to take day jobs to stay afloat. With Cody still fixated on the specialty cattle sale, Misty encourages him to do it on his own, without the help of Bubba and Booger. A new opportunity falls in Bubba's lap to operate a ranch for a group of organic feed investors. While it seems to be a dream role for Bubba, he struggles with the fact that it would require him to move his family north and away from the other cowboys. After much anticipation and practice, Booger heads to Kentucky for the Road to the Horse competition, where he faces the challenge of managing an unruly horse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: Far Haven
programme.desc: In 1887, Hunter Braddock moves back to Far Haven, Arizona to start over with his two young children, but when his father-in-law is brutally attacked he must take on the corrupt forces strangling the town in order to protect what he loves most.

programme.title: Christmas in Maple Hills
programme.desc: Valerie Warrick is shocked to learn that her family's land is registered to a mysterious D Property Company. Days before Christmas, she teams with a handsome travelling doctor to unravel the mystery to her family's past and her heart's future.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E9 The Brahma Bull Cheyenne stops to visit his friend Sam Varney. When Varney's son, Harper, tries to rescue his Brahma bull calf from a barn fire with no success, he's badly injured. Cheyenne decides to bring him another bull, but trouble ensues during his journey.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E10 The Wedding Rings After a stray bullet kills a young boy's father, Cheyenne befriends Pepe and takes him to his mother in Mexico. They meet Pepe's grandfather, a rising dictator of a province who's demanding tax payments in the form of wedding rings from villagers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E3 Unsaddled and Unraveled Booger heads to Austin to work with a former contestant in preparation for the Road to the Horse competition. programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Fear Merchants The Cartwrights help a Chinese-American stable hand who finds himself accused of murder. Opposing them is a manipulative mayoral candidate, Andrew Fulmer, a bigoted man who wants all foreigners to leave Virginia City.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E5 Buck Up, Cowboy With Booger still at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba are left to do the day-to-day work. Bubba surprises Cody with news that he has to head to Mississippi to help his father-in-law. Cody has to take care of the ranch by himself, adding to his frustrations with the business. Luckily for him, Misty steps in to help. Bubba breaks the news to Kaley's parents that they might be moving north for a new job opportunity. After a bit of hesitation, they show their support - just in time for Bubba and Kaley to check out a ranch that could potentially be their future home. Cody visits possible sites for his specialty cattle sale and feels discouraged until he comes across the perfect location. Meanwhile, Booger starts the second round in the Road to the Horse competition, and things don't go as planned. In the end, he makes a tough decision and puts what's best for the horse ahead of winning.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E6 Partnership Hits the Fan While volunteering with kids in the community, Cody makes a connection with a possible buyer for his specialty cattle sale. With Booger still away at the Road to the Horse competition, Cody and Bubba recruit a friend to help with the work on the ranch. Cody rushes to finish up for the day, determined to make it home in time for his son's first haircut, but in his haste, he ends up hurting himself. Bubba visits an organic ranch in Texas to learn more about the organic business. To test the product, he cooks up store brand and grass-fed steaks to compare the taste and make sure it is something he can get behind. Booger finally gets home after the competition and immediately receives an opportunity to train horses in Austin. After spending some time apart, the cowboys come together to talk about the future of their partnership. Things take a turn for the worse when the meeting between friends gets heated, leaving the fate of their business up in the air.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E13 A Friend in Need A man named Carl Avery kidnaps Mark and demands a $5,000 ransom for his safe return. Lucas mortgages his ranch to a longtime friend for the money. When Lucas delivers the ransom, he discovers his friend is part of the disturbing kidnapping plot.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E14 Skull Lucas and Mark are separated on a hunting trip. During his search, Lucas enters Skull Ranch, a headquarters for outlaws. The gang forces him to help break out two members from jail. Lucas has no choice after he learns they've captured Mark as well.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Legend of the Blue-Eyed Apache When eleven-year-old Herman Lehmann is torn away from his frontier home by an Apache raiding party, he must adapt in order to survive. He soon forgets the life he unwillingly left behind and is adopted by an Apache family. For close to a decade, he lives as a Native American, learning their language and customs. Eventually, he even joins the same type of raiding party that separated him from his family. Though the years pass by, Herman's mother never gives up hope that she will be reunited with her son. One day, she hears a rumor of a blue-eyed Apache now living on a reservation. Could this be her long-lost son? Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Herman's mother to uncover the real story of the blue-eyed Apache.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Real Lone Star Ranger When young Texas Ranger Ira Aten is having trouble hunting down a ruthless outlaw, he enlists the help of John Hughes, an aloof rancher with an uncanny talent for tracking bad guys. The two men form an unlikely and unexpected bond while traversing the dusty path toward justice. With Hughes' guidance, Aten finally catches up to the outlaw and ends his reign of terror. Along the way, Hughes decides to become a Ranger himself and transforms from loner to lawman. Hughes' adventure with Aten is just the first chapter of a storied career that inspires the popular novel, The Lone Star Ranger. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Aten years later to uncover the real story of the Lone Star Ranger and separate the truth from the fiction.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E6 Tom Fitzpatrick: Trapper, Trader, Legend Although from humble beginnings, Tom Fitzpatrick is ambitious and intelligent. When he joins up with William Ashley's trapping expedition, he proves himself to be an invaluable member of the company, both as a hardy frontiersman and a shrewd businessman. Along with legendary mountain man Jedediah Smith, Fitzpatrick rediscovers the South Pass through the Rocky Mountains, opening the pathway that will enable western expansion for decades to come. Fitzpatrick quickly rises to the top of the fur trade and eventually takes over the company he once worked for, but he nearly loses everything when he takes a wrong turn while leading a supply train. Alone in the wilderness, he finds himself in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a band of Gros Ventre warriors. Somehow, Fitzpatrick must survive the harrowing trek back to safety without a horse, gun, or supplies.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E4 Between Rock Creek and a Hard Place After getting in an argument with a Union Army recruiter, Noah becomes the prime suspect of murder when the recruiter turns up dead. The riders become involved in the investigation. Meanwhile, Noah befriends Quinn and his sister Cassie.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E11 The Idol Cheyenne agrees to transport a new schoolteacher and her young son Gabe to Creek Point. The Kirby brothers disrupt Cheyenne's plans when they mistake him for a notorious gunslinger Ben Shelby, who they aim to kill.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E12 One Way Ticket While traveling by train to Denver with prisoner Cole Younger, Cheyenne runs into problems. Friends of Younger try to free him by kidnapping the brakeman, and a beautiful widow and her son distract Cheyenne along the way.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Spanish Grant The Cartwrights are in a battle over the validity of a Spanish land grant. They plan to stop the De La Cuesta family from seizing part of the Ponderosa along with all of the Carson Valley settlers' homestead lands.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E33 The Money Gun Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E7 Friends or Foes? When their conversation about their partnership hits a wall, each cowboy decides to branch out and focus on their individual pursuits. Booger completes a job for an acquaintance who asks him to find a horse for his teenage granddaughter. The search for the right horse proves to be challenging, but he finally finds one gentle enough for an amateur rider. The experience reminds Booger of how passionate he is about working with horses, and he decides to accept the offer to train them in Austin. Struggling to find buyers for his specialty cattle sale, Cody meets with the Cattle Association Board to pitch the specialty sale to them and secure buyers. Bubba heads north to show the investors a location for the organic ranch, but when they don't show up, he starts to wonder if this deal was a big mistake. Booger, Cody, and Bubba meet up and decide to sell off their entire herd, officially putting their partnership on hold. Jaclyn comes up with a plan to mend Booger and C

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E8 Friends 'Til the End While visiting family in Mississippi, Cody secures prize cattle for his specialty sale, but one small mistake puts the deal in jeopardy. In anticipation of their move north, Bubba and Kaley visit their favorite places around town and take a trip down memory lane. Bubba breaks the news to his mother about the organic farm. After he catches her up on his current situation with the other cowboys, she encourages him to make things right. Booger heads to Austin, where he learns how to work with English-style horses and receives an offer to train horses for the entire summer. Booger returns home and gets a big surprise when Jaclyn introduces him to their newest family member. Cody reaches out to Booger and Bubba to get them all together so they can make amends and work out their differences. The cowboys consider taking a big job in Texas and working together again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E15 The Princess Lucas and Mark find a young woman named Jennifer and her ill brother, Charles, hiding in their barn. Doc Burrage treats the boy for measles and they take refuge at the McCain Ranch, but soon Lucas learns that she may be a runaway princess from Europe.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E16 Gunfire Infamous outlaw Charlie Gordo is in the North Fork Jail waiting for the U.S. Marshal to take him to Yuma for hanging. Micah learns that the lawman is dead, and Gordo's gang is arriving soon. Micah, Lucas, and others defend the jail from the gang.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E6 Bass Reeves: Trailblazing Lawman After escaping the bonds of slavery, Bass Reeves takes refuge among the indigenous people of The Indian Territory, where he is welcomed into their culture. When the Civil War ends, his new-found tracking skills and fluency in native languages lead to his appointment as the first Black Deputy U.S. Marshal west of the Mississippi River. Though he faces discrimination from his peers, Reeves earns their respect when he accepts Judge Isaac Parker's daunting order to hunt down one of the most ruthless killers in The Indian Territory and bring him back dead or alive. Some years later, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews Judge Parker to learn more about the amazing career of Bass Reeves, who goes on to arrest 3,000 felons, kill 14 men in self-defense, and complete 32 years of service without being wounded.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill's prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok's former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill's blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E3 Jim Beckwourth: War Chief of the Crow When former slave Jim Beckwourth heads west to seek work as a trapper, he begins what will become one of the most eventful, heroic lives of all the mountain men. As a joke, one of Beckwourth's fellow trappers tells a group of Crow warriors that Beckwourth is a long-lost member of their tribe, and the adventure begins. Adopted by the Crow, Beckwourth joins them in a series of ferocious battles with other tribes, becomes a war chief, and falls in love with a fierce female warrior named Pine Leaf. He then uses his hard-won influence with the Crow to convince them to provide furs to the powerful American Fur Company. But an unexpected visit from legendary trapper and old friend Tom Fitzpatrick sets off a violent collision that forces Beckwourth to choose between the two worlds he loves.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Presence of Mine Enemies Ike meets and falls in love with Emily Metcalfe. When a card shark named Neville murders her gambler father, Emily seeks revenge. Ike intervenes in her plans to try to protect her, but suffers from a gunshot in the process.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E13 The Bad Penny Four men, who are leading citizens of Calista, receive anonymous mail with death warnings after a beautiful woman named Penelope Piper arrives in town. When the deaths begin to happen, Cheyenne must investigate to uncover the mystery.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E1 The Durango Brothers Hortense Durango wants her daughter, Lottie, to find a husband. While searching for six missing men, Cheyenne meets the Durango brothers and becomes a prospect for Lottie's future husband.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E4 Blood on the Land A vile and murderous sheepherder, Jeb Drummond, contrives a plan to have Adam Cartwright taken hostage in an attempt to blackmail Ben and force him to sign over a large section of Ponderosa land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E35 Blood Brothers Lucas finds a wounded man, takes him to the North Fork doctor, and gives blood to help save the stranger's life. Marshal Torrance won't help as he says he knows the man and wants him dead. Things become more complicated when vigilantes ride to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E36 Stranger at Night Coming home from school, Mark stumbles upon a dead man's body. Lucas discovers he was stabbed and the only clue is a belt with the initials R.M. Lucas leaves Mark with Artemus Quarles, a cousin who is visiting. Quarles, however, is not who he seems.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E37 The Raid A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E36 Stranger at Night Coming home from school, Mark stumbles upon a dead man's body. Lucas discovers he was stabbed and the only clue is a belt with the initials R.M. Lucas leaves Mark with Artemus Quarles, a cousin who is visiting. Quarles, however, is not who he seems.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E37 The Raid A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S6 E9 A Pea in the Pod After all the time and effort Cody and Misty spent on preparing and organizing, the day of their specialty cattle sale finally arrives and proves to be a huge success. Jaclyn is hesitant about Booger spending the summer training horses in Austin. Following Misty's advice, he decides to take Jaclyn and Matthew on a trip to the Lone Star State so he can show them what a great experience it could be for the entire family. Bubba's deal to start an organic ranch up north falls through, but with the investors still interested in working with him, a new opportunity presents itself. Cody, Booger, and Bubba get back in the swing of things and head to Texas for a grueling cattle drive. With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E1 Saddle Up, Partner After going their separate ways to focus on individual pursuits, the cowboys come back together to help a friend rope some wild hogs. Realizing they still make a good team, they decide to partner up again to take their operation to a new level. Grandma reminds Booger of his family's deep roots in the Florida cattle business, and Booger is inspired to look south for work in areas that aren't affected by the drought. Bubba and Kaley host the gang for a cowboy-inspired gender reveal party. Cody surprises Misty with the plans to move forward on building their dream home.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E17 The Quiet Fear Jake Striker buys Brice Hornsby's farm after moving to North Fork. Townspeople befriend Jake's pretty daughter, Abbey, who is deaf and cannot speak. Problems arise when a trail bum attacks her and blames the hired hand. Lucas must find the truth.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy's arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E9 Elfego Baca & the Frisco Shootout Just days on the job and brandishing a homemade badge, nineteen-year-old Deputy Elfego Baca's courage is immediately put to the test. After arresting a drunken cowboy for shooting up a saloon, Baca faces down the cowboy's friends, who are hired guns for a wealthy rancher. He wins the first skirmish, but the cowboys return with reinforcements and the stage is set for the biggest and longest gunfight in Old West history. Baca seeks shelter in a small adobe house and makes his stand against a small army of men who shoot up the house with thousands of rounds of ammunition over the course of 33 hours. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson gets the real story of what comes to be known as the Frisco Shootout from the former sheriff who deputized Baca just prior to the legendary gun battle.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E5 Kit Carson: The Greatest Scout in the West As a fur trapper, hunter, scout, and explorer, Kit Carson is an irresistible subject for reporters and novelists, and his incredible adventures make him a mythic figure in his own lifetime. Yet fame is the last thing on Carson's mind in 1849. All he wants to do is settle down to a quiet life with his wife on the family ranch, but once again fate comes calling. When settler Ann White is captured by an Apache raiding party, the Army seeks out Carson to help track the warriors and rescue Mrs. White, whose husband was killed in the raid. Although known to be the best tracker in the history of the Western Frontier, Carson admits this is the most difficult trail he has ever followed. He leads the military on a desperate chase, tracking the Apache through 200 miles of treacherous western wilderness. When they finally catch up with the Apache, the aftermath leaves Carson haunted for the rest of his days.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E6 Survivors Buck continues to grieve over Ike's untimely death. Meanwhile, Cody falls for Julia, the widow of a gunrunner who has a young son named Danny. Cody helps them both adjust to life on their own.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E2 Satonka While resting in the mountains, Cheyenne hears the cries of a man. He witnesses him falling to his death. Back in town, he learns of the fears and superstitions surrounding Satonka folklore. Cheyenne must solve the mystery.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S7 E3 Sweet Sam Cheyenne arrives in Rock Springs. He meets Sam Pridemore, who stops a killer and becomes the town hero. He seems to be everyone's friend. But Cheyenne is suspicious, thinking he is planning to rob the bank of its gold.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: S1 E5 Desert Justice When a U.S. Marshal arrests one of the Ponderosa's workers for murder and takes him to Los Angeles for trial, Hoss and Adam go to make sure the marshal doesn't kill the accused before they get there.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way

With the help of Booger, Kaley surprises Bubba with an exciting announcement that could change their lives.

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Walker tries to clear his friend Sam of murder charges after an archaeologist is murdered while conducting a dig on a Cherokee site.

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Escaped felons hiding in a church take two nuns hostage and threaten to kill a group of battered women if their demands are not met.

programme.desc: We go behind the scenes and get to know the drivers behind the helmet; from seasoned veterans to young upstarts, each racer has a different path but one goal -- to win the title.

programme.title: 2025 Lamborghini Super Trofeo
programme.desc: Highlights of the international auto racing series.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: He's an Indy 50 winner, IndyCar champion and a fan-favorite now working as the team principal of one of the series' most popular teams; Paul Tracy is talking with TK.

programme.title: Road to Glory

programme.title: 2025 Lamborghini Super Trofeo
programme.desc: Highlights of the international auto racing series.

programme.title: 2025 Supercars Championship Highlights
programme.desc: For over 60 years, this championship has established itself as the premier motorsport series in Australia. Likewise, it has become a favorite all over the world due to its trademark aggressive racing.

programme.title: Baja Desert Championship: Origins
programme.desc: The SCORE Baja 1000 is the toughest, most dangerous off-road desert race known to man.Facing a battle between man, machine, and the elements, hear from the drivers challenging themselves on the most unforgiving off-road racing terrain in the world.

programme.title: The Charge: Mustangs at Le Mans
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the Mustang Challenge held an international round at the famed Circuit de la Sarthe, as nearly 40 Mustangs took to the iconic track and competed in the race of a lifetime. We meet the drivers, including Tanner Faust and Frankie Muniz, and chronicle all the on track action… in The Charge: Mustangs at Le Mans.

programme.title: Racers Unchained
programme.desc: Paul Tracy sits down with Robby Gordon, one of the most versatile and fearless competitors in motorsports history. From NASCAR ovals to desert dunes, Gordon's career is a testament to relentless ambition and boundary-pushing innovation.

programme.title: Off-Road Travel TV
programme.desc: The team travels to Montana to go off-roading; Ken Faught takes flight and lands on a backcountry grass strip near Glacier National Park; testing Forest River's Nobo 16.6 Beast Mode off-road trailer.

programme.title: Hot Rod History Lessons
programme.desc: Uncover where synthetic oil actually came from; we're exploring a fighter jet pilot's path to pursue his vision to of how a jet fighter pilot pursued his vision to create a high-performing engine oil for automotive use.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: The Jeeps are invading again, and the teams is here for all the action in the Great Smoky Mountains in Pigeon Forge, Tenn.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Dennis travels to Arizona for the Tucson Classics Car Show.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into building a brand-new bed for the '59 Apache right beside the old one!

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Join master mechanic Sam Mahdavi for new projects, repairs and the best parts on the market.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Fauda
programme.desc: After retiring from the Israel Defense Force, Doron is working on a vineyard. He gets roped back into active duty, though, upon learning that an enemy who Doron thought his unit had killed is still alive and plans on attending his brother's wedding. Doron rejoins the IDF team with the intention of going under cover at the wedding, but the plan goes awry when the team's cover is blown. That sets into motion a chaotic chain of events and leads IDF into a manhunt to locate and kill the squad's target.

programme.desc: Two soldiers try to readjust to normal life after 17 years in captivity.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.desc: (2021) Comedy horror with Milana Vayntrub. A park ranger is sent to a town where everyone is at each other's throats, figuratively at first, but then literally. Is a werewolf to blame?

programme.title: Carrington, VC
programme.desc: (1954) Anthony Asquith's vivid and subtle courtroom drama casts David Niven as the eponymous officer accused of stealing army money and going absent without leave.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: (1948) Adaptation of Graham Greene's story with Ralph Richardson and Bobby Henrey. A butler who is accused of murdering his wife, has only a schoolboy to fight his corner.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: (2016) Action-comedy with Dwayne Johnson and Kevin Hart. Two former school buddies team up to thwart a terrorist plot. But things may not be as they seem. With Amy Ryan and Jason Bateman.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: (2022) A gang of violent home-invaders find out the hard way that you REALLY don't want to be on Santa's naughty list, in Tommy Wirkola's dark, violent Christmas comedy. With David Harbour.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: (2003) Action with Colin Farrell and Samuel L Jackson. A loose canon joins an elite force to escort a fugitive to chokey. But the baddie's put a reward out for help with his escape.

programme.title: Mothering Sunday
programme.desc: (2021) Romantic drama with Odessa Young and Olivia Colman. In 20s England, a writer working as a maid has a passionate affair with the rich boy next door. It's not considered a good match.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Arizona Raiders
programme.desc: (1965) William Whitney's brutal western. Two former Confederate rebels are offered their freedom if they can track, catch or even kill their former gang mates. Starring Audie Murphy.

programme.title: Cover Girl
programme.desc: (1944) Rita Hayworth and Gene Kelly star in Charles Vidor's Technicolor comedy musical about a chorus girl's rise to fame. Featuring songs and a score from Jerome Kern and Ira Gershwin.

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: (1952) War drama. Trevor Howard plays the captain of an ageing US warship, gifted to the British navy, which is chosen to lead the raid on Saint-Nazaire in 1942. With Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: (1958) Romantic thriller. George Baker stars as a heroic Cavalier horseman, beating off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly smuggles the country's aristocracy to safety in France.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: (2005) Violent action-thriller starring Jason Statham as the tough courier Frank Martin, who's hired to guard a government drugs czar's son. But his mission soon lurches towards disaster.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: (2009) Quentin Tarantino's World War II action-adventure. Jewish American soldiers go Nazi-hunting in occupied France. With Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Christoph Waltz and Michael Fassbender.

programme.title: A Private Function
programme.desc: (1984) Michael Palin and Maggie Smith star in Alan Bennett's comedy set in food-rationed post-war Britain. In 1947, an illegally owned pig is secretly being fattened for a royal feast.
